name: 楊勝明
objective: 本課程主要研習電能轉換器之原理及運用,主要內容包括: 電力電子開關,AC-DC轉換器,DC-DC轉換器, 電源應用電路,AC-DC轉換器，馬達控制應用電路。

week:
(1) introduction (ch1),power semiconductor switches(ch.2)
(2) review of basics (ch.3)
(3) diode rectifier (ch.5)
(4) diode rectifier (ch.5)
(5) diode rectifier (ch.5)
(6) dc to dc converters (ch.7)
(7) dc to dc converters (ch.7)
(8) dc to dc converters (ch.7)
(9) Mid-term
(10) switch mode power supplies (ch.10)
(11) switch mode power supplies (ch.10)
(12) dc to ac inverters (ch.8)
(13) dc to ac inverters (ch.8)
(14) resonant converters(ch.9)
(15) introduction to motor drives (ch.12)
(16) dc motor drives (ch.13)
(17) emerging device and circuits (ch.26)
     practical converter design constraints (ch.27-29)
(18) Final exam
